Conventions: OceanSITES v1.4,SeaDataNet_1.0,COARDS, CF-1.6, CMEMS INSTAC v3.2
title: LAUV Survey to Assess Vertical Temperature-Salinity Profile off the Nazar√© Coast During FRESNEL Activities
summary: This deployment of a Light Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (LAUV), conducted as part of the FRESNEL project activities and funded by ONR, N0014-22-1-2796, involved using a CTD sensor to make a preliminary assessment of oceanographic conditions.  Anomalies in the vehicle trajectories were found when the vehicle went deeper than the set maximum depth. Possible relation with internal wave activity in the region.
keywords: temperature of the water column – TEMP – WC_Temp; salinity of the water column – PSAL – WC_Sal; electrical conductivity of the water column – CNDC – WC_Cond; sound velocity in the water column – SVEL – WC_SoundVel;
